body.p:
77 Dearborn Street
Chicago 4 June 1863
Dear Sir,
I am this morning favored with yours of 30th ulto Enclosing Commission for Kentucky --
For your kind & prompt attention please accept my thanks.
Enclosed you will find my oath of office & $5 for your fee -- The impression of my seal is already on file, having as I explained to you held a former Commission --
